name: DanceMusic
0:
”Alexa, open Dance Music”
”Alexa, start Dance Music”
”Alexa, play Dance Music”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dance music
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Dance Music helps children warm up or take a quick exercise break. You can say "next" for additional music and "stop" when you’re finished listening. Search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill store for additional learning experiences. We love receiving feedback from users and greatly appreciate reviews!

Music by: Bensound

About SayKid
SayKid is a voice technology company that has developed the world's 1st screenless, play-based learning platform to foster a love of learning in a safe, natural, and engaging way - kids play the role of teacher. Our goal is to engage young kids that are hard to reach, build skills that are difficult to teach, and replace screen time with speech.

Awards
- SayKid named Finalist in the Alexa EdTech Competition 
- Harvard names SayKid a Finalist in the Saul Zaentz Early Education Competition
- SayKid wins MN Cup "Moonshot" Prize at US Bank Stadium
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
